detail_desc: Straight-style shirt in linen with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Pyjamas in soft velour. Long-sleeved top with an appliqué on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, round neckline, short sleeves and a rounded hem.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, lightly padded cups and ties at the neck and back.
5-pocket shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved dress with a lightweight sweatshirt top with a print motif on the front and cuffed sleeves. Flounced skirt in a patterned viscose weave.
Football shirt in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif front and back. Short raglan sleeves ending in a double layer in a contrasting colour.
Fully lined bikini top with padded cups, wide shoulder straps that cross at the back, and a plastic fastener at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a print motif on the front, slightly wider neckline and long sleeves. Longer and rounded at the back.

Straight-cut, knee-length dress in a linen and viscose weave with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Flap chest pockets and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Straight-cut blouse in a patterned weave with a small stand-up collar, concealed buttons at the top and long sleeves with cuffs.
Shorts in cotton twill. High, frill-trimmed paper bag waist with elastication, and a zip fly with buttons. Side pockets and wide legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
Top in a soft, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a chest pocket, slits in the sides and raw-edge hem. Longer at the back.
Long T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a drawstring hood, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a raw-edge, rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Alice band in plastic with two glittery pumpkins.

Flared dress with a sewn-in bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey. Dress with cap sleeves and a skirt in broderie anglaise, buttons down the back and a seam at the waist. Bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch.

Romper suit in soft velour with press-studs at the back and double-layered cap sleeves, one layer in chiffon with a discreet foil print. Seam at the waist, gently tapered legs and smocking at the hems.

Parka in woven fabric with a detachable, quilted inner jacket and a faux fur trimmed hood. Zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front, patch pockets with a flap at the front and a drawstring at the waist. Inner ribbing at the cuffs.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.

Set with a top and pair of shorts in organic cotton. Top in jersey with a round neck, short cap sleeves and a tie detail at the front of the hem. Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and contrasting colour trims.

Shirt jacket in sturdy, brushed twill containing some wool. Collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back, flap chest pockets with a button, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with an open back and ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with an opening and tie at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flared, tiered skirt. Unlined.
Trainers in imitation leather with appliqués, a hook and loop fastening at the front and a padded top edge. Terry linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Top in a soft, gently draping silk and cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini with lace. Triangle top with a decorative ring at the front, adjustable ties at the back of the neck and a plastic fastener at the back. Bottoms with decorative rings at the sides.
Longer V-neck jumper in a soft textured knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
A-line dress in soft jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and elastication at the top. Unlined.
3/4-length running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh sections on the legs. High, elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring and a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Vest tops in soft, ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a gentle V-neck, lace trim at the top and narrow shoulder straps with lace.
Sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and zipped side pockets. Unlined.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey, two with flounces across the front. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Set with a top and trousers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Relaxed fit joggers with an easy pull-on elasticated, drawstring waist, low crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

Padded jacket in a quilted weave with a detachable, fleece-lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, welt front pockets with a press-stud, and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
T-shirt in jersey with a motif.

Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood with a ribbed edge and drawstring at the front. Low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves, a kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in airy linen jersey with a round neckline and straight-cut hem.
Sunglasses with metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Short, high-waisted shorts in a viscose weave with pleats at the top, wide elastication at the back of the waist, and side pockets.
Short top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap and two-way zip at the top. One inner compartment. Lined. Size 12x19x24.5 cm.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Top in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved dresses in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Long cardigan in a soft knit containing some alpaca wool with patch pockets and ribbing around the neckline cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Waistcoat in a cotton weave with buttons down the front and fake front pockets. Lined.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend containing glittery threads with scalloped tops.
Knee-length shorts in washed cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Body in soft jersey with a print motif on the front, wide shoulder straps and a low-cut back. Lined gusset with press-studs.

Wide blouse in a woven cotton blend with glittery thread embroidery. Stand-up collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and short puff sleeves with cuffs and covered buttons. Yoke at the back and wide tie at the top.

Shirt in checked cotton twill with a brushed finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, a yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Cotton jersey hipster briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Wedge-heel sandals in imitation suede with elasticated straps that cross over the foot, covered toes and a braided jute trim around the soles. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 3 cm, heel 5.5 cm.
Ankle-length trousers in a viscose weave. Covered elastication at the waist with a small frill trim and a decorative bow with tassels. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Warm-lined Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides, a loop at the back, pile linings and insoles, and fluted soles.
Long-sleeved jumper in jacquard-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Satin-covered Alice band with a large, glittery tulle bow at the top.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck top in stretch cotton jersey. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with elastication at the top.

Padded all-in-one suit in a lightly brushed, patterned weave. Pile-lined hood with sewn-on ears at the top, two zips down the front and elastication at the back of the waist. Foldover mitts at the cuffs and foldover feet at the hems to keep the hands and feet warm. Pile and fleece lining.
Fine-knit polo shirt in a silk and cotton blend with a button placket and ribbing at the collar, cuffs and hem.
Imitation suede boots with a fold-down shaft and an opening at the back with a hook and loop fastening. Faux fur linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Whooli Chen x H&M. Straight-cut top in soft jersey made partly from recycled cotton with a print motif on the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Jodhpur boots in imitation leather and imitation suede with decorative straps and a zip at one side. Loop at the back. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and soft terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Chest pocket, side and back pockets, buttons at the sides and slim legs with a gentle flare to the hem.
Leather sandals with narrow straps that tie around the ankles, and covered heels. Leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
5-pocket cropped jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Pool shoes with a padded thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) strap at the top and moulded ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles with fluting underneath.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Concealed elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Calf-length pleated skirt in mesh with a shimmering metallic pattern, an elasticated waist and gentle flare to the hem. Lined.
Wide blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Wide, elbow-length raglan sleeves, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with floral appliqués at the top and a zip at the back. Gathered seam at the waist, detachable satin tie and a gently flared skirt. Satin lining.
Long dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and short, wide sleeves. Seam at the waist with sewn-on ties that can be wound around several times. Unlined.
T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Long dress in chiffon with a lace bodice. Boat neck with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and cap sleeves with scalloped edges. Concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening in one side, a seam at the waist with a decorative grosgrain ribbon, and a softly draping, pleated skirt. Lined.

Blouse in airy chiffon crêpe with embroidery, a V-neck with buttons at the front and a stand-up collar with a small frill. Frill at the front that continues over the shoulders, long sleeves with a wide flounce at the cuffs, and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
